post.description: If one of them cannot be deleted (e.g. because of other linked data), none are.

409.description: Resource cannot be deleted because other data refer to it.

get.description:
Please be wary that resource pictures have a configurable shape that
should be honored when displayed.

This route must be accessed with a query string of `'?'.md5($instanceLogoBlobUri)`, as it is cached as
an immutable resource. Otherwise, you might get an outdated picture.

We settled on using a md5 hash of the
blob URI, in order to obfuscate the blob URI itself and to have an aesthetically clean URL.

200.description: Whenever all healths checks are successful.

post.summary: Sends a login link by email.

get.summary: Enumerates teams which current user can validate.
Enumerates resources which current user can validate.
